actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a definition of the term "artificial bait".

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the manufacturer's excise tax on sporting goods, to exclude from the definition of "artificial bait" any substance which contains 85 percent or more by weight of plant or animal material which can be ingested by fish.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a definition of the term "artificial bait".
